item.title: Bariani
item.description:
Bariani
Bariani is a Olive Oil & products company that is family owned and Operated.
Bariani started the business before 1994 with the mission: Our family gives particular care to the entire extraction process from the tending of the orchard to the bottling of the oil, opting for quality rather than quantity.
Bariani helps sponsor road races in Zamora, has purchased land for possible future hosting of a Sacramento Velodrome, Cyclocross and running events.

item.title: Specialized
item.description:
Specialized
Specialized Bicycles, founded in Morgan Hill, CA in 1974, is a company filled with passionate cyclists who lead the industry with innovative bikes for all types of riding. Specialized is committed to global cycling advocacy and environmental consciousness.

item.title: Bell
item.description:
BellSports
Bell helmets is the official supplier of helmets for the Sacramento Golden Wheelmen Race Team..

item.title: Kenetic Cycles
item.description:
Kinetic Cycles
Why Kinetic? Kinetic Cycles is committed to sharing and spreading our passion for bicycles and the quality of life they offer. Check out Kinetic Cycle - they are right off I-5 in Elk Grove!

item.title: Mark Walker Photos
item.description:
Mark Walker
At Walker Photography, our goal is to capture the moment, whether it be at a wedding, sporting event or glamour shoot. We use all professional Canon digital equipment, and are experts in both traditional and photojournalistic styles. Once your event is captured, we have full editing and post production facilities to get just the look you have in mind...color, black and white, sepia, soft focus, composites, etc. We also offer full printing and album services, and custom printing from wallet prints to posters. Full digital videography services are also available. At Walker Photography, we are here for you. Capture the moment....

Voler
Voler Team Apparel an official supplier to the Sacramento Golden Wheelmen Racing Team.

item.title: Wells Fargo
item.description:
WellsFargo
Wells Fargo & Company provides diversified financial services through more than 9,000 stores, 12,000 Wells Fargo and Wachovia ATMs, and the Internet across North America and internationally.

item.title: Williams Cycling
item.description:
Williams Cycling
At Williams Cycling, our mission is simple: to produce wheel systems that are of the highest quality and functionality. Importantly, we believe we can produce this product at an affordable price point that allows all levels of cyclists to experience the virtues of high performance wheel systems historically reserved for the elite / unlimited budget athlete. Williams is the bike wheel sponsor for the Sacramento Golden Wheelmen Racing Team.
